caption.title: Specification of samples analysed on the EBV peptide microarray.
caption.p: Technical replicates (repeated IgG purification and microarray processing from the same sample) and sample replicates (repeated sampling from one individual) are included and indicated with a dot and a consecutive number after the individual number (1â€“20) and sample type (plasma P and saliva S). Samples 1.Pla.4, 1.Sal.2, 14.Sal.2, 14.Sal.4, 17.Pla.2, 2.Pla.3 and 2.Sal.2 are technical replicates of the according previous sample ID (e.g. 1.Pla.4 is the technical replicate of 1.Pla.3).
Click here for additional data file.
